description: This file defines a React functional component named SidebarSteps that renders a sidebar with step indicators and navigation links for a home buying guide platform. It highlights the active step based on the current URL, displaying either loading placeholders or the steps list with progress indicators.

methods.name: SidebarSteps({ steps, loading })
methods.description: A React functional component that displays a list of steps in a sidebar. Shows loading state when data is loading and highlights the active step based on the URL.
